titleStmt.title: The authority of God over men, in the law cleared, shewing that its no persecution for the magistrate as Jehovah's deputy, in Jehovah's name, to enforce it on the people, but that he is bound to do the same. Written by an unworthy witness to the law and government of God, John Brayne.
titleStmt.author: Brayne, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Rich. Moone, and are to be sold at the seven stars in Pauls Church-yard, neer the great north door,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the seven stars in Pauls Church-yard, neer the great north door
